com.rest.restservice

Class RestHelper.RestServiceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rest.restservice.RestHelper.RestServiceHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    Enclosing class:
    RestHelper

    public abstract static class RestHelper.RestServiceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    Helper class for handling REST service. The client service class should extend this abstract class.

      • RestServiceHelper

        protected RestServiceHelper(java.lang.String url,
                            boolean tokenexpected)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        url - The REST service URL, Important : without leading / (look registerService method)
        tokenexpected - If security token is expected for this call

    • Method Detail

      • getParams

        public abstract RestParams getParams(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange httpExchange)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Abstract method to be implemented. Is called only once after the REST query was received and is valid during current call. The method can dynamically define REST service according to REST url.
        Parameters:
        httpExchange - Current HTTPExchange
        Returns:
        RestParam current REST call specification.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of any problem. It the exception is throws then the servicehandle method is not called.

      • servicehandle

        public abstract void servicehandle(RestHelper.IQueryInterface v)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Custom logic to handle REST request
        Parameters:
        v - Context, getValues contains parsed URL query parameter values getRestParans : returned by getParams getT : current HTTPExchange handler
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • produceResponse

        protected void produceResponse(RestHelper.IQueryInterface v,
                               java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> message,
                               int HTTPResponse,
                               java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> token)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        General helper method to use by custom servicehandle method
        Parameters:
        v - Context handler
        message - Optionnal, response content, if empty the no content is returned.
        HTTPResponse - HTTP response code, some codes are specified in as public static attributes
        token - Optional, security token to be included in the response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getAuthorizationToken

        protected java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getAuthorizationToken(RestHelper.IQueryInterface v)
        Helper method, extract authorizarion token if expected
        Parameters:
        v - Context
        Returns:
        Empty if authorization token not found in the HTTP header

      • getAuthorizationToken

        protected java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getAuthorizationToken(RestHelper.IQueryInterface v,
                                                                     boolean expected)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Get authorization token, if token expected prepare HTTPBADREUQUEST response if token not found
        Parameters:
        v - Context
        expected - if true and token not found produce HTTPBADREQUEST response
        Returns:
        if Optional.empty do not proceed, HTTPBADREQUEST response already sent
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPath

        protected java.lang.String[] getPath(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange t)
        Parse URL path without query parameters. Break path into subpath
        Parameters:
        t - Context
        Returns:
        String[] containing URL path broken to subpaths.

      • getStringParamExpected

        protected java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getStringParamExpected(RestHelper.IQueryInterface v,
                                                                      java.lang.String param)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Gets string query value. Produces HTTPBADREQUEST response if parameter is not specified
        Parameters:
        v - Context
        param - Key/param name
        Returns:
        Optional. If empty error response is already produced and do not proceed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
